fullContent:
--

I realized learning is about small, consistent steps. Today I spent 30 minutes improving my JavaScript and Python skills. Tiny progress adds up!

title: Why I Love Open Source?
fullContent:
--
Listen
Share
Open source is amazing because it allows anyone to contribute and learn. I joined a beginner-friendly repo on GitHub and submitted my first pull request today.

title: My First JavaScript Project
fullContent:
--
Listen
Share
Today I started learning JavaScript. I built a small calculator and it actually works! I learned about functions, variables, and how to debug errors. Excited to build more projects!
